data.name: Poly Skies Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This is the original Poly Skies soundtrack. A collection of calming and rhythmic beats designed to help you relax while playing Poly Skies.

Contains both standard and HQ quality audio files.

Purchasing this OST will help support the composer and future projects, thank you!
data.about_the_game:
This is the original Poly Skies soundtrack. A collection of calming and rhythmic beats designed to help you relax while playing Poly Skies.

Contains both standard and HQ quality audio files.

Purchasing this OST will help support the composer and future projects, thank you!
data.short_description: The official soundtrack to Poly Skies.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 33 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 156 MB available space

data.legal_notice: Purchasing this product includes the soundtrack only and does not include the base game, Poly Skies.
